title: Allow multiple flume instances
body:
It was not possible to use the script to start multiple instance. These changes allows multiple instances to be started be setting FLUME_AGENT_NAME or by writing a simple wrapper like:

---

 #!/bin/bash 
 export FLUME_AGENT_NAME=$1 
 COMMAND=$2
  /etc/init.d/flume-ng-agent $COMMAND

---

Ex:

 # flume-wrapper.sh start agent1
 # flume-wrapper.sh start agent2

 # flume-wrapper.sh stop agent1 
 # flume-wrapper.sh stop agent2

title: A module for smoke tests for httpfs
body:
I assume that HttpFs proxy is exported via HTTPFS_PROXY e.g.
export HTTPFS_PROXY=hostname:port

I created an independent (optional) module (instead of simply adding tests in hadoop/hdfs module), because one could have no HttpFs installed and running on his/her cluster.
